definition: palm of the hand/sole of the foot/paw/horseshoe/to slap/to hold in one's hand/to wield

lit. the fish and the bear's paw, you can't have both at the same time (idiom, from Mencius); fig. you must choose one or the other/you can't always get everything you want/you can't have your cake and eat it

lit. the fish and the bear's paw, you can't have both at the same time (idiom, from Mencius); fig. you must choose one or the other/you can't always get everything you want/you can't have your cake and eat it
pinyin: yu2 yu3 xiong2 zhang3 bu4 ke3 jian1 de2

sentences.english: I prefer bear's paw to fish.
Part four is "Delima Between Fish and Bear"s Paw.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分爲“魚與熊掌之間”。

sentences.english: Fish and bears paw, both must.
As adults, we sometimes don't get to have it all.
sentences.chinese: 作爲成年人，有的時候魚和熊掌不能兼得。

sentences.english: This is very difficult for fish and bear's paw exclusive.
sentences.chinese: 這就是魚和熊掌很難兼得的。

sentences.english: My daddy once used his bear hand catched a bullet.
sentences.chinese: 我的老爹一次用他的熊掌抓住了一顆子彈。

sentences.english: Mr Obama, it seems, wants it both ways.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬似乎想要魚與熊掌兼得。

sentences.english: Yet, at the same time, the BIS wants to eat its cake and have it too.
sentences.chinese: 然而，國際清算銀行其實是在希望能魚與熊掌兼得。

sentences.english: In an equestrian community you get to have your cake and eat it too.
sentences.chinese: 在這樣的馬術社區，你可以魚與熊掌兼得。

sentences.english: You can't have your cake and eat it, too.
sentences.chinese: 因爲你不能魚與熊掌兼得。

sentences.english: Hard work means sacriface of time.
sentences.chinese: 有的時候你沒法魚和熊掌兼得。

sentences.english: You know, you can't have one without the other in a way, you know.
sentences.chinese: 在某種程度上，魚與熊掌不可兼得。

sentences.english: But if I cannot get both, so I would take bear paw instead of fish.
sentences.chinese: 二者不可得兼，舍魚而取熊掌者也。

sentences.english: He estimated that thousands were smuggled each year.
sentences.chinese: 他估計每年有上千只熊掌被走私。

sentences.english: Putin has already indicated that Kiev can’t pursue both goals.
sentences.chinese: 普京早就道明，基輔不能魚與熊掌兼得。

sentences.english: K is for king , kings and bears often worry keepers.
sentences.chinese: 代表國王，國王和熊掌使守護人擔心。

definition: (coll.) foot of an animal or bird/(coll.) foot supporting a cooking pot etc
foot of a bird or animal/paw/claws/talons
